Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Devil Gigatron tilts his head to the side as he watches Iron Raptor.

Devil Gigatron: "Devil Gigatron gives respect to noone but Devil Gigatron. 
And if you are refusing to live up to your responsibilities, don't come 
crying to Devil Gigatron when the Infecticons come to this piece of monkey 
crap and blast it to crap."

Devil Gigatron turns away from them as he begins to walk away from them 
rather annoyed.

Devil Gigatron: "No wonder Devil Gigatrons future is screwed up. The damn 
Maximals sent a bunch of pansy lead by some Jabroni who's to chicken to swing 
at her shadow. "

--part1_a7.12456321.28aa9b09_boundary
